Could not obtain smartcard record for writing to card.
Could not obtain card serial number
Could not update smartcard record before writing to card
Fill out forms for a patient
Use a step by step wizard to choose what you want
Please enter a caption for the audio
You need a barcode scanner application to register clients from mobile. Please check whether it\'s been installed in your device or not.
Read successful but the card appears to be blank:
The card is not empty. Please use a new card.
Please enter digits that matches CheckDigit algorithm
Your search includes client id, given name, middle name and family name and searched only in the device
Your search includes client id, given name, middle name and family name and searched on the server
Select one or more cohorts from the list and click on \'Next\' to download
Start typing to filter the cohorts…
Please press load to fetch available cohorts list from server
A cohort is a predefined group of clients for which you can fill forms and download observations. The prefix(es) set here will be used to download cohorts afterwards.
Cohort prefixes restrict your cohort downloads to only those starting with the specified prefix
Please select cohorts from all cohorts list and click sync
In this step of the wizard, you download the cohorts you need. Please select the cohorts and click next.
Complete forms are available only if you have filled a form completely but have not synced it with the server
Add concept(s) that you want observation(s) to be downloaded.
Please provide a consultant from the list of possible consultants
An unexpected error occurred forcing mUzima to stop. Please help us fix this by sending us error data, all you have to do is click OK.
Please add your comments about the problem below.
Client does not have an SHR. Do you want to create new SHR and write to card?
Please enter a date prior or equal to today
Here you define concepts whose data will be included in later download.
Here you download locations that will show up in the forms.
Here you download providers that will show up in the forms.
This selected encounter location will be the default encounter location for all forms
Logged-in user will be used as the default encounter provider
Warn the user when duplicate form data for same client with same encounter date is being saved
Please provide a location from the list of possible locations
Please provide a provider from the list of possible providers
The value in which your forms will be automatically saved
Please select forms from all forms list and click download
Please press load to fetch available forms from the server
There is one or more validation check failed on this form. Please review and resubmit the form
Please enter a date in the future
Location is switched off! Kindly turn on location in settings.
Select a preset configuration and let mUzima do the rest for you
Please enter a caption for the image
Incomplete forms are available only if you have saved a partially filled form
Would you like to install P-Smart app?
Please connect your device and try again
Add location(s) that you want to download.
Get more concepts from the server or remove concepts from this device. Concepts are used to configure what observations to download.
Get more locations from the server or remove locations from this device
Get more providers from the server or remove providers from this device
Make sure you have connectivity to server and press the load button
If \'None\' is selected, no other options can be selected
Did you change your password recently?
Invalid Phone Number. Please check and re-enter
You do not have provider rights or your provider data is not downloaded, please use add provider option.
Add provider(s) that you want to download.
Enable real time synchronization of data
Please select non-registration forms from all forms list and click download
Please select at least one registration form!
Minimum repeats not satisfied. Needs at least
Please select reports from all forms list and click download
Require client\'s medical record number during registration
Please contact your server administrator to check server connectivity
If in-active for this time, mUzima will automatically logout
Please set default encounter location so as to enable writing new card
Do you want to re-download this setting from server?
Kindly switch on location in settings.
Please enter a caption for the video
Select one or more form templates from the list and click on \'Next\' to download
Do you want to write Shared Health Record to card ?
Client Identifier changed on the server. The new identifier will be used going forward.
No clients matched your search locally. Enter at least 3 characters for remote search.
No clients matched your search on the server

mUzima is also distributed under the terms of the following Additional Disclaimer of Warranty and Limitation of Liability.

Additional Disclaimer of Warranty and Limitation of Liability

In the United States, or any other jurisdictions where they may apply, the following additional disclaimer of warranty and limitation of liability are hereby incorporated into the terms and conditions of MPL 2.0:

1. No warranties of any kind whatsoever are made as to the results that You will obtain from relying upon the covered code (or any information or content obtained by way of the covered code), including but not limited to compliance with privacy laws or regulations or clinical care industry standards and protocols. Use of the covered code is not a substitute for a health care provider’s standard practice or professional judgment. Any decision with regard to the appropriateness of treatment, or the validity or reliability of information or content made available by the covered code, is the sole responsibility of the health care provider. Consequently, it is incumbent upon each health care provider to verify all medical history and treatment plans with each patient.

2. Under no circumstances and under no legal theory, whether tort (including negligence), contract, or otherwise, shall any Contributor, or anyone who distributes Covered Software as permitted by the license, be liable to You for any indirect, special, incidental, consequential damages of any character including, without limitation, damages for loss of goodwill, work stoppage, computer failure or malfunction, or any and all other damages or losses, of any nature whatsoever (direct or otherwise) on account of or associated with the use or inability to use the covered content (including, without limitation, the use of information or content made available by the covered code, all documentation associated therewith, and the failure of the covered code to comply with privacy laws and regulations or clinical care industry standards and protocols), even if such party shall have been informed of the possibility of such damages.

4. If the user of this application is an entity intending to commercialize or make a profit out of any application that uses this code in a for-profit venture, the user is required to contact the copyright holder through mUzima.mobile@gmail.com

Please send us your comments and feedback
How easy to use mUzima App?
Thank you for your message. \n Your feedback is important for us.
Your message will not be sent.
No email client installed on this device. \n Please install one and then leave your feedback.
Please tell us how we can help you
Thanks for reaching out. \n Our support team will investigate your request. \n We will back to you as soon as possible.
This will cancel the form download. Are you sure you want to cancel form download?
The Registration Lock PIN is not the same as the SMS verification code you just received. Please enter the PIN you previously configured in the application.
Please enter your mobile number to receive a verification code. Carrier rates may apply.
You have exceeded the sms limit, kindly consult server admin.
Unable to reach server, kindly check your internet connection.
Unable to send verification sms consult server admin
You must specify your country code
You must specify your phone number
The number you specified (%s) is invalid.
Unable to open this link. No web browser found.
mUzima needs access to your contacts and media in order to connect with friends, exchange messages, and make secure calls
Please enter the verification code sent to %s.
Registration of this phone number will be possible without your Registration Lock PIN after 7 days have passed since this phone number was last active on mUzima. You have %d days remaining.
You\'ve made too many incorrect Registration Lock PIN attempts. Please try again in a day.
You must enter your Registration Lock PIN
This phone number has Registration Lock enabled. Please enter the Registration Lock PIN.
Please enter the verification code sent to %s.
Your safety number with %s has changed.
Received a message encrypted using an old version of mUzima that is no longer supported. Please ask the sender to update to the most recent version and resend the message.
You set the disappearing message timer to %1$s.
%1$s set the disappearing message timer to %2$s.
Your safety number with %s has changed.
You marked your safety number with %s verified
You marked your safety number with %s verified from another device
You marked your safety number with %s unverified
You marked your safety number with %s unverified from another device
Received key exchange message for invalid protocol version.
Received message with new safety number. Tap to process and display.
Received key exchange message, tap to process.
MMS message encrypted for non-existing session
Error downloading MMS message, tap to retry
You have pending mUzima messages, tap to open and retrieve
Your safety number with %s has changed and is no longer verified
Your safety numbers with %1$s and %2$s are no longer verified
Your safety numbers with %1$s, %2$s, and %3$s are no longer verified
Your safety number with %1$s has changed and is no longer verified. This could either mean that someone is trying to intercept your communication, or that %1$s simply reinstalled mUzima.
Your safety numbers with %1$s and %2$s are no longer verified. This could either mean that someone is trying to intercept your communication, or that they simply reinstalled mUzima.
Your safety numbers with %1$s, %2$s, and %3$s are no longer verified. This could either mean that someone is trying to intercept your communication, or that they simply reinstalled mUzima.
Your safety number with %s just changed.
Your safety numbers with %1$s and %2$s just changed.
Your safety numbers with %1$s, %2$s, and %3$s just changed.
Give your inbox something to write home about. Get started by messaging a friend.

mUzima needs Contacts permission in order to search your contacts, but it has been permanently denied. Please continue to app settings, select \"Permissions\", and enable \"Contacts\".
Received key exchange message, tap to process.
Send failed, tap for unsecured fallback
This message will not be encrypted because the recipient is no longer a mUzima user.\n\nSend unsecured message?
Can\'t find an app able to open this media.
Your safety number with %1$s has changed. This could either mean that someone is trying to intercept your communication, or that %2$s simply reinstalled mUzima.
You may wish to verify your safety number with this contact.
Share your profile name and photo with this group?
Do you want to make your profile name and photo visible to all current and future members of this group?
Make your profile name and photo visible to this group?

plurals.name: ConversationFragment_this_will_permanently_delete_all_n_selected_messages
plurals.item: This will permanently delete the selected message.
This will permanently delete all %1$d selected messages.

resources.string: To call %s, mUzima needs access to your microphone and camera.

mUzima needs the Microphone and Camera permissions in order to call %s, but they have been permanently denied. Please continue to app settings, select \"Permissions\", and enable \"Microphone\" and \"Camera\".
There is no app available to handle this link on your device.
mUzima needs access to your contacts in order to display them.

mUzima requires the Contacts permission in order to display your contacts, but it has been permanently denied. Please continue to the app settings menu, select \"Permissions\", and enable \"Contacts\".
Error retrieving contacts, check your network connection
Touch to open, or touch the lock to close.
The version of Google Play Services you have installed is not functioning correctly. Please reinstall Google Play Services and try again.
mUzima PHR was unable to register with Google Play Services. mUzima PHR messages and calls have been disabled, please try re-registering in Settings > Advanced.
